input.sentences: we went to see the amusement park at the chinese temple this week .
the atmosphere was amazing and we enjoyed it .
the lights were breathtaking and we could stare at them for hours .
even the temple was lit up from the top to bottom !
output.sentences: The ride lit up in the sky.
And the riders swings went round and round.
There were decorations of hanging stars.
And the trees were lit up as well.
The whole city was shining brightly.
